item.title: Trains The State Of Not Being
item.author: Author
item.description: Tis strange, but it is certainly true to some extent: being on trains is like being in another plane of existence: it is a separate social place, with ever changing, ever moving background. Because of the vast space it encompasses, it does not feel like a vehicle, it feels like another moving world. The Feeling of a New Start Every time I embark on a train trip, I feel like I’m going to start my life over, like a hopeful lad who tries he’s fortune in the New World.
